basic_info.description: My name is Thomas Basham and I am a bootcamp and partially self taught Software Developer. I am a US Army Veteran and a former carpenter. I decided to start learning Software Development because I was feeling like the only enthusiastic person in my former trade of carpentry. I want to be challenged mentally and also flex my creativity and be apart of a community of driven, talented people in an environment where everyone is constantly learning, so after researching all of the available languages that the preferred bootcamp in my area is currently teaching, I chose to learn Python because it appears to be the most in demand and fluid language I can learn, although I hope this is barely the start of how many languages I will learn throughout my career. I’m looking forward to bringing my creative skills and strong work ethic that I’ve gained from my experience in the Army and as a Carpenter to the tech community.

projects.title: Bus Mall
projects.description: A Web Application that takes a client's product images and allows the user to vote their favorite out of 3 displayed giving the client market research information

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: A web application that compiles relevant fictional product sales so that the client can have more accurate stock and staff counts

projects.title: Beverly Hills Madlibs
projects.description: A madlibs style web application that takes in a users input and writes a pre-curated story with the users words inserted. Made with with James Brooks, Marcus Hartwig, and Abdinnasir Yussuf. Titled Beverly Hills per our groupname
